name: Fall Asleep with Dead Ringer Lures
name_original: Fall Asleep with Dead Ringer Lures
description:
Controls:

  • Tap RIGHT or D to charge right
  • Tap LEFT or A to charge left

Inputs are infinitely bufferable in both directions

Do you have trouble falling asleep? That won't be a problem ever again with Fall Asleep with Dead Ringer Lures, the sleep aid that harnesses the soporific powers of Dead Ringer lures to put you to sleep within 3 minutes guaranteed. 

ᴵᶠ ʸᵒᵘ ᵈᵒ ⁿᵒᵗ ᶠᵃˡˡ ᵃˢˡᵉᵉᵖ ᶦᵗ ᶦˢ ⁿᵒᵗ ᵐʸ ᶠᵃᵘˡᵗ ʸᵒᵘ ᶠᶦⁿᵈ ˡᵘʳᵉˢ ᵉˣᶜᶦᵗᶦⁿᵍ

Features: 

- Incredibly boring lure gameplay

- Time dilation

- Dead Ringer lullaby

- Authentic Dead Ringer experience when a racer does lures for the billionth time and you have to go along with it

- Indestructible bells for endless gameplay excitement

Assets are from Brace Yourself Games.

Created for: https://itch.io/jam/gamejamdor4
